basics.name: Eric Kim
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student at the University of Hawaii at Manoa and I'm majoring in B.S. Computer Science. I expect to graduate in spring of 2026.

highlights: Supervised and ensured the safety of children after school, while maintaining a secure and welcoming environment.
Collaborated with fellow leaders to facilitate play sessions with different grades.
Managed conflicts and resolved issues among children in a fair and constructive manner.
Create a welcoming experience by authentically greeting all guests
Engage with guests in a genuine way, which include asking questions to better understand their specific needs
Be knowledgeable of GM areas to ensure sales floor is zoned, in stock and accurately signed and priced for guests
Execute inbound, replenishment, backroom and signing processes for GM areas
Sign up for a list of different volunteer events year round
Learn the specific instructions to aid in those events and execute
Teach proper form and strategy to tennis players of all level
Provide aid during matches by giving advice and providing players with water

awards.title: Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to students and continuing students who maintain a GPA of 3.0 or higher.
